Retrieves all users who are part of this group.

This may not return full user information if users are not friends but have mutual connections.

post.description:
Creates an invite to this channel.

Channel must be a `TextChannel`.

get.description: Fetch multiple messages.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Maximum number of messages to fetch

For fetching nearby messages, this is \`(limit + 1)\`.

schema.description:
Maximum number of messages to fetch

For fetching nearby messages, this is \`(limit + 1)\`.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Message id before which messages should be fetched

schema.description: Message id before which messages should be fetched

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Message id after which messages should be fetched

schema.description: Message id after which messages should be fetched

parameters.name: nearby
parameters.description:
Message id to search around

Specifying 'nearby' ignores 'before', 'after' and 'sort'. It will also take half of limit rounded as the limits to each side. It also fetches the message ID specified.

schema.description:
Message id to search around

Specifying 'nearby' ignores 'before', 'after' and 'sort'. It will also take half of limit rounded as the limits to each side. It also fetches the message ID specified.

post.description: This route searches for messages within the given parameters.
Pins a message by its id.

delete.description: Unpins a message by its id.

get.description: Retrieves a message by its id.

delete.description: Delete a message you've sent or one you have permission to delete.

patch.description: Edits a message that you've previously sent.

delete.description:
Delete multiple messages you've sent or one you have permission to delete.

This will always require `ManageMessages` permission regardless of whether you own the message or not.

Messages must have been sent within the past 1 week.

post.description: Create a new group channel.

put.description: Adds another user to the group.

delete.description: Removes a user from the group.

post.description: Asks the voice server for a token to join the call.

put.description:
Sets permissions for the specified role in this channel.

Channel must be a `TextChannel` or `VoiceChannel`.

Sets permissions for the default role in this channel.

Channel must be a `Group`, `TextChannel` or `VoiceChannel`.

delete.description:
Remove your own, someone else's or all of a given reaction.

Requires `ManageMessages` if changing others' reactions.

Remove your own, someone else's or all of a given reaction.

Requires `ManageMessages` permission.

get.description: This will tell you whether the current account requires onboarding or whether you can continue to send requests as usual. You may skip calling this if you're restoring an existing session.

post.description: This sets a new username, completes onboarding and allows a user to start using Revolt.

Create a new Web Push subscription.

If an existing subscription exists on this session, it will be removed.
Remove the Web Push subscription associated with the current session.

Fetch settings from server filtered by keys.

This will return an object with the requested keys, each value is a tuple of `(timestamp, value)`, the value is the previously uploaded data.
Upload data to save to settings.

parameters.description:
Timestamp of settings change.

Used to avoid feedback loops.

Timestamp of settings change.
